instructions.title: SURFACE PREPARATION
instructions.data: For pre-painted galvanized surfaces: Sand lightly then wipe the surface with a clean rag before applying paint. Remove all loose paint film to sound surface. Spot prime bare substrate. For corroded galvanized surfaces: Remove rust by wire brushing and use BOYSEN®® Metal Etching Solution B‑71. Let it stay for 10-15 minutes before washing with water. Be sure to remove all remaining residue and dry completely. Solvent wipe then prime immediately.

instructions.title: PAINTING SCHEDULE
instructions.data: Primer (for resulting bare substrate): BOYSEN®® Red Oxide Metal Primer B‑310 or BOYSEN®® Rust-Off™ B‑330 Topcoat (2 coats): BOYSEN®® Quick Drying Enamel

instructions.title: NOTES
instructions.data: Check paint compatibility of BOYSEN®® Quick Drying Enamel to the existing coating. Use BOYSEN®® Paint Thinner B‑0340 as thinning solvent only. Immediately apply primer after recommended surface preparation to avoid occurrence of flash rusting.

calculator.title: Topcoat
calculator.note: For Semi-Gloss topcoat, use BOYSEN®® Semi-Gloss Enamel B‑200.
